thread.section_title: Orbit Fitness Equipment Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Orbit Fitness Equipment | www.orbitfitness.com.au
thread.title: Adrian Musson
thread.title_full: Orbit Fitness Equipment reviewed by Adrian Musson

author: Adrian Musson
title: Adrian Musson
text:
Orbit's online system is great. It was easy to search for what I wanted. Simple to to order and pay for. The option to pick up from my nearest store made it convenient for me as I don't have anywhere for the delivery to be left when I am at work. The item was ready to collect within a few days of placing my order. My only criticism is that I didn't receive a notification that the item was ready to be picked up. I just happened to stop by the store to ask and it was there waiting for me. Store staff were really friendly though and said they would have notifies me later that day. So will give them the benefit of the doubt this time ðŸ˜‰
Would certainly recommend this option though.
